--- title: ghtop keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "See what's happening on GitHub in real time (also helpful if you need to use up your API quota as quickly as possible)." description: "See what's happening on GitHub in real time (also helpful if you need to use up your API quota as quickly as possible)." nb_path: "nbs/index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

ghtop provides a number of views of all current public activity from all users across the entire GitHub platform. (Note that GitHub delays all events by five minutes.)

{% include image.html max-width="850" file="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/56260/101270865-3f033780-3732-11eb-8dcc-97caf7cc58e6.png" %}

Install

Either pip install ghtop or conda install -c fastai ghtop.

How to use

Run ghtop -h to view the help. There are 4 views you can choose:

ghtop simple

A simple dump to your console of all events as they happen.

{% include image.html align="left" max-width="500" file="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/346999/101861674-79e7df80-3b25-11eb-92d3-f888843f4aa2.png" %}

ghtop tail

Like simple, but removes most bots, and only includes releases, issues and PRs (open, close, and comment events). A summary of the frequency of push events is also shown at the bottom of the screen.

{% include image.html align="left" max-width="700" file="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/346999/101861658-69376980-3b25-11eb-96ef-9d68f075abf7.png" %}

ghtop quad

The same information as tail, but in a split window showing separately PRs, issues, pushes, and releases. This view does not remove bot activity.

{% include image.html align="left" max-width="900" file="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/346999/101861560-2ecdcc80-3b25-11eb-9fba-25382b2df65f.png" %}

ghtop users

A summary of activity for the most active current users, including bots.

{% include image.html align="left" max-width="500" file="https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/346999/101861612-4b6a0480-3b25-11eb-8124-19bb2434c27e.png" %}
